resources.string: Outgoing calls are restricted by FDN.

All calls are restricted by access control.

Normal calls are restricted by access control.

Use default operator settings to display my number in outgoing calls

During a call, notify me of incoming calls
"Your operator doesn't support disabling call forwarding when your phone is busy."
"Your operator doesn't support disabling call forwarding when your phone doesn't answer."
"Your operator doesn't support disabling call forwarding when your phone is unreachable."
"Your Phone app's Fixed Dialing Numbers setting is turned on. As a result, some call-related features aren't working."
Please turn on the radio before viewing these settings.
"Couldn't change the voicemail number. Contact your operator if this problem persists."
"Couldn't change the forwarding number. Contact your operator if this problem persists."
"Couldn't retrieve and save current forwarding number settings. Switch to the new provider anyway?"
"Your SIM card doesn't allow a connection to this network."
"Can't connect to this network at the moment. Try again later."
Enable data access over Mobile network
Connect to data services when roaming
Connect to data services when roaming
You have lost data connectivity because you left your home network with data roaming turned off.
Allow data roaming? You may incur significant roaming charges!

"%1$s maximum exceeded Data rate reduced to %2$d Kb/s"

Data rate reduced to %1$d Kb/s if data usage limit is exceeded
"More information about your operator's mobile network data usage policy"
"FDN wasn't updated because you typed an incorrect PIN."
"FDN wasn't updated because the number can't exceed 20 digits."
"FDN wasn't updated. The PIN2 was incorrect or the phone number was rejected."
No contacts on your SIM card.
To import contacts from the SIM card, first turn off Aeroplane mode.
"The old PIN that you typed isn't correct. Try again."
"The PINs that you typed don't match. Try again."
Type a PIN that is 4 to 8 numbers.
The PIN that you typed was incorrect.
Password incorrect; SIM is locked! PUK2 requested.
"The PUK2 that you typed isn't correct. Try again."
"The old PIN2 that you typed isn't correct. Try again."
"The PIN2s you typed don't match. Try again."
Type a PIN2 that is 4 to 8 numbers.
Type a PUK2 that is 8 numbers.
Password incorrect. Change PIN2 and retry.
Password incorrect, SIM is locked. PUK2 requested.
To place a call, first turn off Aeroplane mode.
Call not sent. No valid number entered.
Call not sent. %s is not an emergency number!
Call not sent. Dial an emergency number!
Set the length of DTMF tones

"A special call needs to be made to activate your phone service.
After pressing “Activate”, listen to the instructions provided to activate your phone."

"If you skip activation, you can't place calls or connect to mobile data networks (though you can connect to Wi-Fi networks). Until you activate your phone, you are asked to activate it each time that you turn it on."
Follow the spoken instructions until you hear that activation is complete.
Please wait while your phone is being programmed.
Your phone is now activated. It may take up to 15 minutes for service to start.

"Your phone didn't activate. You may need to find an area with better coverage (near a window or outside).
Try again or call customer service for more options."
"The action selected isn't available during an emergency call."
For all calls when data network is available
Always use to place Internet calls
You can change which Internet calling account to use by default from the Phone > Settings > Internet call settings > Accounts screen.
There are no Internet calling accounts on this phone. Do you want to add one now?
Account registration stopped because there is no Internet connection.
Account registration stopped because there is no Wi-Fi connection.
Account registration unsuccessful: (%s); will try later
Account registration unsuccessful: Incorrect username or password.
Account registration unsuccessful: Check the server name.
This account is currently in use by the %s app.
"%s is required and can't be left blank."
Port number should be within 1000 and 65534.
To make an Internet call, check your Internet connection first.
You need to be connected to a Wi-Fi network for Internet calls (use the Wireless & Network settings).

The recording has been saved to
Application is not installed on your phone.

A video call cannot be set up. Dial a voice call?
The phone is not in a 3G service area, dial a voice call?

3G service is off. Do you want to turn it on?

The current camera cannot support this setting

Voice call cannot be answered a video call is in already progress.
Camera not available, video call cannot be connected. Check if another application is using the camera.
Cannot display video properly. Call disconnected
Accepting this call will end the voice call(s).
Accepting this call will end the outgoing call and reject the incoming call.
Accepting this call will end the current call and reject the incoming call.
End current call, it cannot be held.

Name and number cannot both be empty.

The IP dial function is not applicable to internet calls.

Phone number and call waiting settings
Are you sure you want to set 3G service for this SIM? This will also set it as the default SIM for Video calls.
Switching the SIM will take around ten seconds. Please wait...
Are you sure you want to turn off 3G service? This will turn off Video call service as well.

The phone will not select other operators in manual selection mode. Sometimes, if the selected service has been lost, manual selection must be repeated, or automatic selection can be used. We recommend that \"Select automatically\" be used. Select the network manually?
"Currently, there is no service from the selected operator for the \"%s\" SIM card. We recommend that you use the \"Select automatically\", or you can select another operator manually."
"Currently, there is no service from the selected operator. We recommend that you use the \"Select automatically\", or you can select another operator manually."
You are making an international call. Please choose your destination.
You are dialling a %s number. Do you want to add the country code (+%s)?
You are dialling a number in %1$s, %2$s. Do you want to add the country and area codes (+%3$s)?
"You are dialling from %s. Change the international call prefix to '+'?"
You are dialling a number in %s. Please enter the area code.
You are dialling a number in %s. If your destination city is not %s, please enter the area code.
The destination city area code is needed for this call.
If the destination city is not %s, please input the destination city area code below.
Click the button below to change the country code.
The number is invalid. Do you want to continue dialling anyway?
Add the country and area codes?
You must enable data roaming for this SIM first. This may incur significant roaming charges! Are you sure you want to enable and select data roaming for this SIM?

3G service is not available with the selected SIM. Data loading may be slow. You can change the 3G service setting under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure you want to select this SIM?

You must enable data roaming for this SIM first. This may incur significant roaming charges! Also, 3G service is not available with this SIM. Data loading may be slow. You can change this under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure you want to enable data roaming and select this SIM?
Searching for all available networks will close the data connection in use. Do you want to continue?
You can say \"%s\" or \"%s\" to answer or ignore an incoming call
Voice control is enabled for Phone
No SIM or SIM error in slot %s
Operations are only allowed on fixed dialling numbers.
No available networks. Please try to switch 3G service, or click on a forbidden network to register manually.
Incorrect PUK2 code entered more than 10 times. SIM card has been permanently locked
Voice encryption is switched off by network
